Rulings.Edison: These rulings apply to all Union Monsters: https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/union-monsters
Rulings.Tengu:
When equipping to a monster:
● If the target is not a Machine, or is flipped face-down or leaves the field, 
this card is destroyed.

While equipped to a monster:
● If the equipped monster is flipped face-down or leaves the field, this card is destroyed at the exact same time (by game mechanics).
● This card is treated as an Equip Spell (and not a monster).

When Summoning this equipped card:
● If there is no empty Monster Zone when this effect resolves,
this card is sent to the GY.
● If the equipped monster is flipped face-down or leaves the field, this card is destroyed at the exact same time (by game mechanics).

Rulings.Base: 1. Equipping this card is an Ignition Effect of a monster. Special Summoning this Equipped Card is considered the effect of a Spell Card.\n2. You can add a Union Monster to your hand with the effect of "Machina Peacekeeper" even during the Damage Step.

PSCT.Edison:
① When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can add 1 Union monster from your Deck to your hand. 
② Once per turn, you can either: 
● Target 1 Machine you control; equip this card to that target, OR: 
● Unequip and Special Summon this card in Attack Position. 
③ If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.
④ A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time.
PSCT.Tengu:
① When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can add 1 Union monster from your Deck to your hand. 
② Once per turn, you can either: 
● Target 1 Machine you control; equip this card to that target, OR: 
● Unequip and Special Summon this card. 
③ If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.
④ A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time.
